content: bag approx 12 across and 11 tall **crochet hook** smaller bag in worsted yarn size 4 0mm crochet hook with worsted weight yarn larger bag in bulky yarn size 5 5mm hook with bulky weight yarn **notations** scissors 3 yarn needle 4 removable stitch marker 5 brown strap optional ivory strap optional wood blocking board 6 **abbreviations** chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet ps - puff round- round stsc - stacked single_crochet stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch **skill level** advanced beginner/intermediate benefits - handmade charm the hexagon crochet bag is a perfect accessory for those who appreciate the beauty and uniqueness of handmade items - versatile design with a suggested adjustable strap this bag can be worn as a shoulder or cross-body bag offering flexibility to suit different occasions and preferences - easy to create the easy-to-follow pattern along with the video tutorial and chart makes it accessible to both beginners and experienced crocheters ensuring a successful and enjoyable diy project - personalized touch with various color options and stitch combinations you can create a bag that reflects your personal style and preferences quality assurance the hexagon crochet bag pattern is designed with attention to detail ensuring clear instructions and a seamless crocheting experience our crochet patterns are meticulously designed and tested to ensure accuracy and clarity the video tutorial provides step-by-step instructions making it easier to follow along and complete your project successfully additionally the included charts add visual guidance for those who prefer a more visual learning experience this pattern assumes that you already have basic crochet skills and are familiar with reading crochet patterns & is not intended to teach you how to crochet or read a crochet pattern it is solely an instructional guide to create the specific pattern shown in the pictures and accompanying video tutorial when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2023 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in listing and patterns are not to be used for the sale of your item 1 https //brianakdesigns com/hexagon-granny-square-bag-pattern/ 2 https //youtu be/bawo_qgvcl0 3 https //shrsl com/2cibs 4 https //shrsl com/2bor2 5 https //shrsl com/3xv7g 6 https //amzn to/3qokup5
